attributes.title: The Big Energy Gamble
attributes.description_short: Can California's ambitious plan to cut greenhouse gases actually succeed?
attributes.description_long: As Governor of California, Arnold Schwarzenegger launches a dramatic and controversial program to slash carbon dioxide emissions and promote energy efficiency. NOVA explores the pros and cons of California's bold approach, which calls for improvements in energy efficiency in homes and commercial buildings; increased reliance on renewable power sources, primarily solar and wind, and more.

attributes.title: Is There Life on Mars?
attributes.description_short: The search for life on the Red Planet heats up with the discovery of frozen water.
attributes.description_long: After four decades of fly-by probes, orbiters, landers, and rovers, the quest for life on Mars is as tantalizing as ever. NOVA goes behind the scenes of the latest NASA missions to the Red Planet to reveal new clues and challenges on the road to answering this ultimate question. NOVA shows scientists and engineers in action, directing the operations of spacecraft millions of miles away.

attributes.title: Ocean Animal Emergency
attributes.description_short: Wildlife veterinarians struggle to save injured seals and sea lions.
attributes.description_long: Wildlife veterinarians struggle to save injured seals and sea lions on the California coast.

attributes.title: The Bible's Buried Secrets
attributes.description_short: An archeological detective story traces the origins of the Hebrew Bible.
attributes.description_long: An archeological detective story traces the origins of the Hebrew Bible.

attributes.title: Alien From Earth
attributes.description_short: Do the remains of a tiny hobbit-like creature belong to a new human species?
attributes.description_long: Do the remains of a tiny hobbit-like creature on the island of Flores belong to a new human species?

attributes.title: Hunting the Hidden Dimension
attributes.description_short: Mysteriously beautiful fractals are deepening our understanding of nature.
attributes.description_long: Mysteriously beautiful fractals are shaking up the world of mathematics and deepening our understanding of nature.

attributes.title: Space Shuttle Disaster
attributes.description_short: An investigation uncovers the failures and design flaws behind the 2003 Columbia tragedy.
attributes.description_long: An investigation uncovers the human failures and design flaws behind the 2003 Columbia tragedy.

attributes.title: Arctic Dinosaurs
attributes.description_short: Trek through Alaska to explore how dinosaurs once thrived in polar regions.
attributes.description_long: Experts in Alaska investigate how dinosaurs managed to thrive in polar regions..

attributes.title: Lord of the Ants
attributes.description_short: E.O. Wilson's fascination with little creatures has led him to some very big ideas.
attributes.description_long: E.O. Wilson's fascination with little creatures has led him to some very big ideas.

attributes.title: Car of the Future
attributes.description_short: The "Car Talk" guys look for a new breed of clean, fuel-efficient vehicles.
attributes.description_long: Join "Car Talk" hosts Tom and Ray Magliozzi as they take a look at plug-in hybrids, all-electric roadsters, biofuels and more in this lighthearted but shrewd take on America's four-wheeled future. John Lithgow narrates as the brothers mix their trademark slapstick with serious nuts-and-bolts analysis of what it will take to make our autos more energy-efficient.

attributes.title: Cracking the Maya Code
attributes.description_short: The story behind the centuries-long decipherment of ancient Maya hieroglyphs.
attributes.description_long: The story behind the centuries-long decipherment of ancient Maya hieroglyphs.

attributes.title: Ape Genius
attributes.description_short: Experts zero in on what separates humans from our closest living relatives.
attributes.description_long: Experts zero in on what separates humans from our closest living relatives.  Ape Genius received a 2009 Emmy nomination for Outstanding Science, Technology, and Nature Programming.

attributes.title: A Walk to Beautiful
attributes.description_short: A powerful story of healing & hope for women in Ethiopia devastated by childbirth injuries
attributes.description_long: 2009 Emmy Winner: A powerful story of healing & hope for women in Ethiopia devastated by childbirth injuries.  A Walk to Beautiful won the 2009 Emmy Award for Outstanding Informational Program - Long Format.

attributes.title: Absolute Zero
attributes.description_short: The story of the harnessing of cold and the race to reach the lowest temperature possible.
attributes.description_long: The story of the harnessing of cold and the race to reach the lowest temperature possible.

attributes.title: Secrets of the Parthenon
attributes.description_short: How did the ancient Athenians build this near-flawless icon of Greece's golden age?
attributes.description_long: How did the ancient Athenians build this near-flawless icon of Greece's golden age?  Secrets of the Parthenon received a 2009 Emmy nomination for Outstanding Science, Technology and Nature Programming.

attributes.title: The Four-Winged Dinosaur
attributes.description_short: Surprising fosils from northeastern China spur a debate over how birds evolved.
attributes.description_long: Surprising fossils from northeastern China spur a debate over how birds evolved.

attributes.title: Astrospies
attributes.description_short: An elite corps of U.S. astronauts is trained to gather intelligence on the Soviets.
attributes.description_long: An elite corps of U.S. astronauts is trained to gather intelligence on the Soviets.
